column1: The '''American Mensa Tolkien Special Interest Group''' publishes [[Beyond Bree]] monthly. From their website:
:[[Beyond Bree]] is the newsletter of the Tolkien Special Interest Group of American Mensa (Mensa is a high-IQ society). Subscriptions are open to all lovers of Tolkien's Middle-earth
column2: Mensan and non-Mensan alike. Subscriptions cost $12 per year (12 issues) USA
column3: foreign $15. A sample issue costs $1 plus SASE USA

column1: :Beyond Bree is published once a month. A typical issue is 12 pages long
column2: contains short articles on J.R.R. Tolkien and his works; reviews of books
column7: or inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien and his works;reviews of books
column12: or inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien and his works
column13: and general fantasy which might be of interest to the Tolkien fan. Also readers' views; fan publications
column16: occasional poetry and puzzles. We seldom publish fiction. Since we are too widely scattered to meet in person
column17: Beyond Bree carries news of conventions and gatherings where the Tolkien fan might find others of similar interests. And
column18: if readers have questions about Tolkien or his works
